hnx.representations package#

Submodules#

hnx.representations.projections module#

hnx.representations.projections.bipartite_projection(h: Hypergraph)[source]#

Returns a bipartite graph representation of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected.

Returns:

g

Return type:

networkx.Graph. The bipartite graph representation of the hypergraph.

hnx.representations.projections.clique_projection(h: Hypergraph, keep_isolated=False)[source]#

Returns a clique projection of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected. :param keep_isolated: :type keep_isolated: bool. Whether to keep isolated nodes or not.

Returns:

g

Return type:

networkx.Graph. The clique projection of the hypergraph.

hnx.representations.projections.line_graph(h: Hypergraph, distance='intersection', s=1, weighted=False)[source]#

Returns a line graph of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected. :param distance: :type distance: str. The distance function to be used. Can be ‘intersection’ or ‘jaccard’. :param s: :type s: float. The threshold for the distance function. :param weighted: :type weighted: bool. Whether the line graph should be weighted or not.

Returns:

g

Return type:

networkx.Graph. The line graph of the hypergraph.

hnx.representations.simplicial module#

hnx.representations.simplicial.get_all_subsets(s)[source]#

Returns all subsets of a set. :param s: :type s: set. The set to get all subsets of.

Returns:

subsets

Return type:

list. All subsets of the set.

hnx.representations.simplicial.simplicial(h: Hypergraph)[source]#

Returns a simplicial complex representation of the hypergraph. :param h: :type h: Hypergraph. The hypergraph to be projected.

Returns:

S

Return type:

Hypergraph. The simplicial complex representation of the hypergraph.
